title: Ticket #7300: Remove WIN_EXEC_NODE_ONLY cmake config knob
description: HTCondor has a cmake build knob, WIN_EXEC_NODE_ONLY, which, when set, only builds some binaries. We never use this knob, it isn't defined in all the places it should be, it confuses build time parameters with packaging decisions, and just generally messes things up. Let's remove this. There's no need to document this change, and it should go into stable, in order to minimize merge conflicts, because it changes the indentation in many cmake files.
remarks:
2020-Mar-30 10:17:56 by tim:
CODE REVIEW Looks good.

No docs needed internal build change.
